segments.text: are you good at making decisions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: not really . Sometimes , I even let other people make key decision for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what kinds of decisions do you leave to other people ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: there are basic decisions like which restaurant to go to . I can never seem to choose . I let my parents make big decisions for me . They chose my university and my course . I ended up studying something
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: your parents will be choosing your girlfriend if you aren ’ t careful ! Why don ’ t you try being more decisive ? Start with some basic ones . When your friends are discussing which restaurant to eat at , mak
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that ’ s a good idea . You ’ re very decisive , I ’ Ve noticed . So , which bar are we going to this evening ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ’ t make a decision . You ’ ll have to put forward an idea .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you see ? You ’ re becoming more decisive already !
segments.speaker: S1
